resources.string:
Instructions on how to use the interface:
1. Enter a search term in the provided EditText.
2. Click the Search button to retrieve definitions from the dictionary API.
3. Click on a search result to see detailed information in a separate fragment.
4. Click the Save icon to add a term to the saved terms list.
5. Access the saved terms by clicking the Saved button.
6. To delete a term, select it and choose the Delete icon from the menu.
7. For more help, you can contact support.
